title: Implying that Riot cares about MMR boosting
body:
implying
http://imgur.com/ncX1PL4,B4n0VIe,I6uu2GV,IZnSEvk,j38Gbb5,kZAZnPc,lyF7YGD

http://i.imgur.com/AmEyZpG.png

this player has been reported numerous times by numerous people and has yet to be banned. ok riot. ok. keep doing your job at balancing and keeping the flow of the game going. no wonder people read more about league of legends then play it.

well done.
